about_the_game:
PRESENTATION

This is a classic 2D old-school RPG in the style of the retro Super NES and Genesis RPGs such as Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest.

Dullahan has the blood of the Witch Slayers in his veins. His family has been responsible for fighting the Grand Witches for centuries. After his father defeated the last Grand Witch alive known as Emerith, he starts training Dullahan to follow on his footsteps, should the day ever arrive.

That day, they will discover, will arrive much sooner than they thought.

The young Dullahan will have to absorb all that his father ever taught him and on his own he will have to learn yet much more, so that he and his companions can defeat the Grand Witches once more, before they bring the world to an end.

FEATURES

  • Classical storyline

  • An open-world experience

  • Optional dungeons to explore

  • Optional bosses to defeat

  • Quest Journal

  • Mouse Support

The young Dullahan will have to absorb all that his father ever taught him and on his own he will have to learn yet much more, so that he and his companions can defeat the Grand Witches once more, before they bring the world to an end.

name: Fated Thread

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
